content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone
    (
        location_id  SMALLINT ,
        borough VARCHAR(15) ,
        zone VARCHAR(50) ,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)  
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
        REJECT_VALUE=10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='rejections/taxi_zone'
    );

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.calendar') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar
    (
        date_key INT ,
        date DATE ,
        year INT ,
        month SMALLINT ,
        day SMALLINT ,
        day_name VARCHAR(20) ,
        day_of_year SMALLINT ,
        week_of_month SMALLINT ,
        week_of_year SMALLINT ,
        month_name VARCHAR(20) ,
        year_month INT ,
        year_weak INT       
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
        REJECT_VALUE=10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='rejections/calendar'
    );

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vendor') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor
    (
        vendor_id SMALLINT,
        vendor_name varchar(100)
    )
    WITH 
        (
            LOCATION = 'vendor.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
            REJECT_VALUE=1,
            REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='rejections/vendor'
    );

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_type') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type
    (
        trip_type SMALLINT,
        trip_type_desc varchar(50)
    )
    WITH 
        (
            LOCATION = 'trip_type.tsv',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = tsv_file_format,
            REJECT_VALUE=1,
            REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='rejections/trip_type'
    );

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_csv') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv
    (
        vendor_id bigint,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(0),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(0),
        store_and_fwd_flag varchar(1),
        rate_code_id bigint,
        pu_location_id bigint,
        do_location_id bigint,
        passenger_count bigint,
        trip_distance float,
        fare_amount float,
        extra float,
        mta_tax float,
        tip_amount float,
        tolls_amount float,
        ehail_fee float,
        improvement_surcharge float,
        total_amount float,
        payment_type bigint,
        trip_type bigint,
        congestion_surcharge float
    )
    WITH 
        (
            LOCATION = 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=*/*.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
            REJECT_VALUE=10,
            REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='rejections/trip_data_green_csv'
    );

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_parquet') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet
    (
        vendor_id bigint,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(0),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(0),
        store_and_fwd_flag varchar(1),
        rate_code_id bigint,
        pu_location_id bigint,
        do_location_id bigint,
        passenger_count bigint,
        trip_distance float,
        fare_amount float,
        extra float,
        mta_tax float,
        tip_amount float,
        tolls_amount float,
        ehail_fee float,
        improvement_surcharge float,
        total_amount float,
        payment_type bigint,
        trip_type bigint,
        congestion_surcharge float
    )
    WITH 
        (
            LOCATION = 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    );



delta_file_format


IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_delta') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta
    (
        vendor_id bigint,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(0),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(0),
        store_and_fwd_flag varchar(1),
        rate_code_id bigint,
        pu_location_id bigint,
        do_location_id bigint,
        passenger_count bigint,
        trip_distance float,
        fare_amount float,
        extra float,
        mta_tax float,
        tip_amount float,
        tolls_amount float,
        ehail_fee float,
        improvement_surcharge float,
        total_amount float,
        payment_type bigint,
        trip_type bigint,
        congestion_surcharge float
    )
    WITH 
        (
            LOCATION = 'trip_data_green_delta',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = delta_file_format
    );



select count(1) from bronze.trip_data_green_parquet

select * from bronze.trip_type;

select * from bronze.vendor;


select * from bronze.taxi_zone;
SELECT * FROM bronze.calendar;
